<# Created by: Kevin Lyons
   Date: 05/16/2022
   Version: 101-3187
   Brief Description: puts a desktop icon with shortcut to URL: "https://ntranet.ncontracts.com/Ncontracts/hp_View.aspx" #>

   
$ErrorActionPreference = 'SilentlyContinue'                                                  #allows the program to continue while ignoring the simple error. 
if(!(Test-Path C:\Users\Public\Desktop\Nformed.lnk))
{
$WshShell = New-Object -ComObject WScript.Shell
$Location = "C:\Users\Public\Desktop"
$ICO_Path = "$env:TEMP\ncontracts.ico"
$Base64_Code = ""
[byte[]]$Bytes = [convert]::FromBase64String($Base64_Code)
[System.IO.File]::WriteAllBytes($ICO_Path,$Bytes)
$shortcut = $WshShell.CreateShortcut("$Location\Nformed.lnk")
$shortcut.TargetPath = "https://ntranet.ncontracts.com/Ncontracts/hp_View.aspx"
$shortcut.IconLocation = $ICO_Path
$shortcut.Save()
}
